### <ins> Brainteasers Part 1 </ins>
Code: <a href="https://github.com/dillonwu-97/csec-code/blob/main/cryptohacks/mathematics/brain-teasers-1.py"> https://github.com/dillonwu-97/csec-code/blob/main/cryptohacks/mathematics/brain-teasers-1.py </a>
4. Broken RSA
You have to use the tonelli-shanks algorithm for the puzzle. The ciphertext is: Hey, if you are reading this maybe I didn't mess up my code too much. Phew. I really should play more CryptoHack before rushing to code stuff from scratch again. Here's the flag: crypto{m0dul4r_squ4r3_r00t}.
